summary: An archaeologist from 1000 years in the future uncovers a romance novel written in our time. Curious, he journeys back to find out about this thing called "love" from the novel's author.
cast: Sara Rue|Barry Watson|Fred Willard|Enisha Brewster|Jordan Wall|Valerie Harper|Mike Pniewski|Cara Mantella|Justin Smith|A. Ali Flores|Jody Thompson|Ritchie Montgomery|Kevin Stillwell|TJ Hassan|Jay Gates|Adam Boyer|Larry Schmidt|Rivka Levin|Orlando Vargas Diaz|Scott Ledbetter|Josiah Lyricq|Tomas Valenti|Demetrius B. Banks|Aurora Betson|Neill Calabro|Ryan Felton|Shane Gray|Joshua Holcombe|Alphonse A. Lambert Jr.|Larry Mainland|Molly Marler|Jerod McBrayer|Darryl D. Moore|Courtney Pennington|Timothy J. Richardson|Tom Stedham|Mark Ezra Stokes|Bethany Tiller|Steve Toney|Steve Warren
title: My Future Boyfriend
